:::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Scourge:::

Ramjet: I think it should only be Cygnar and i who talk the Alliance. The 
rest of you should go to their mess hall, get a drink, and wait.
::Ramjet follows Drillbit to the conference room and sits down across from 
him::
~~~~~
Wheeljack: Yes, i think we are.
::He opens his comm::
Wheeljack: Commander Zardus, we have finished building the repair station.
~~~~~
Scourge: Im Scourge, former leader of the sweeps.  Autofire, huh? How do you 
know Megatron?

--part1_7e.12b4101c.27ee7c1d_boundary
